Main Script

The main.py file is the entry point of the application and is intended to be executed directly. It should not be imported as a module into other code. Use the following command to run the application:

python main.py

It contains the MainApp class, which handles the setup of the Tkinter canvas and UI, but it is not designed for reusability as a module.

class main.MainApp(root)[source]

Bases: object

Main application class that sets up the tkinter window, canvas, and UI elements.

run()[source]

Starts the main event loop of the tkinter application.

setup_canvas()[source]

Sets up the canvas for drawing.

Returns:

A tkinter Canvas object.

setup_ui()[source]

Sets up the UI elements on the left side of the window.

Creates a UI object and calls its setup method.

main.main()[source]

Creates the root tkinter window, initializes the MainApp, and runs the application.

Note

This file should only be executed directly and is not intended to be imported as a module.
